core

Class Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Complex
      • core.Matrix
        • core.Register

  • public class Register
extends Matrix
    The Register class represents a quantum register that contains 'n' qubits
    Author:
    Connor Imrie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Register(Matrix m)
      Constructor for a register using another matrix
      Register(Qubit[] qubits)
      Constructor for a register using an array of Qubits
      Register(java.lang.String reg, boolean decimal, int size)
      Constructor for a register using either a decimal or binary string input Useful for generating large registers quickly from shorthand notation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Register

        public Register(Matrix m)
        Constructor for a register using another matrix
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix used to construct the register

      • Register

        public Register(Qubit[] qubits)
        Constructor for a register using an array of Qubits
        Parameters:
        qubits - the array of Qubits used to construct the register

      • Register

        public Register(java.lang.String reg,
                boolean decimal,
                int size)
        Constructor for a register using either a decimal or binary string input Useful for generating large registers quickly from shorthand notation
        Parameters:
        reg - the number in decimal or binary format for the register, i.e. |2> or |10>
        decimal - is true if using decimal input (i.e. |2>) or set to false if binary (|10>)
        size - is the size of register to represent in. This pads decimal to binary conversion with leading |0> states
